meta.description: Comprimir im√°genes, convertir formatos y generar c√≥digos QR gratis.

hero.title: Herramientas de Imagen y QR
hero.desc: Procesamiento local 100% privado en tu navegador.

compressor.title: Compresor de Im√°genes
compressor.desc: Reduce el tama√±o sin perder calidad.

step1.title: Upload Image
step1.desc: Drag & drop or click to select your JPG, PNG, or WebP image (up to 15MB).

step2.title: Adjust Settings
step2.desc: Set your desired quality level (10-100%) and maximum width.

step3.title: Download
step3.desc: Click compress and download your optimized image instantly.

seo.title: ¬øPor qu√© comprimir?
seo.benefit3: Better user experience on mobile devices
seo.benefit4: Optimized images for social media sharing
seo.p3: All processing happens in your browser using Web Workers - your images are never uploaded to any server, ensuring complete privacy and security.

faq.title: Preguntas Frecuentes
faq.q1: Is my image uploaded to a server?
faq.a1: No! All compression happens directly in your browser. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy.
faq.a2: We support JPG/JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats up to 15MB file size.
faq.q3: How much can I reduce file size?
faq.a3: Typically 50-80% reduction depending on the original image and quality settings chosen.

converter.title: Convertidor de Formatos
converter.desc: Convierte entre JPG, PNG y WebP.

step1.title: Select Image
step1.desc: Upload any image file (JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP supported).

step2.title: Choose Format
step2.desc: Select your desired output format (WebP, JPG, or PNG).

step3.title: Convert & Save
step3.desc: Click convert and download your new image instantly.

seo.title: Understanding Image Formats
seo.p1: Choosing the right image format is crucial for web performance and quality. Here's a comparison:
seo.webp: Modern format by Google offering 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality. Best for web use.
seo.jpg: Ideal for photographs and complex images with many colors. Uses lossy compression.
seo.png: Perfect for images requiring transparency or sharp edges (logos, graphics). Uses lossless compression.
seo.p2: Our converter uses HTML5 Canvas API for instant, client-side conversion. Your images never leave your device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: WebP offers 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality, making your website load faster.
faq.a2: You control the quality slider. Higher values preserve more quality but result in larger files.
faq.a3: Currently, animated GIFs will be converted to a static image (first frame).

qrcode.title: Generador de C√≥digo QR
qrcode.desc: Crea c√≥digos QR para enlaces y texto.

step1.title: Enter Content
step1.desc: Type your URL, text, phone number, or any content you want to encode.

step2.title: Customize
step2.desc: Choose your preferred size and color for the QR code.

step3.title: Generate & Download
step3.desc: Click generate and download your high-resolution QR code as PNG.

seo.title: QR Code Use Cases
seo.p1: QR codes have become essential for businesses and individuals. Common use cases include:
seo.use1: Website URLs - Direct users to your website instantly
seo.use2: Business cards - Share contact information digitally
seo.use3: Product packaging - Link to manuals or support pages
seo.p2: Our QR generator creates high-resolution codes that scan reliably on any device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What can I encode in a QR code?
faq.a1: URLs, plain text, phone numbers, email addresses, WiFi credentials, and more.
faq.a2: 256px is good for digital use. Choose 512px or 1024px for print materials.
faq.a3: No! QR codes generated here are static and never expire. They contain the data directly.
